Description.Text: Being a small hotel, the service here is excellent, offering their guests a 24 hour bureau de change, a hotel doctor on call 24 hours a day if necessary and multilingual and helpful staff. For location, service and facilities we recommend this hotel. (JMG 08/08) The exterior of the hotel is very nice, tastefully covered in wood, in typical Ottoman tradition. This special category hotel is perfectly located for tourists in the area of Sultanhamet, just opposite St. Sophia, the famous Byzantine monument and very close to the Blue Mosque, one of the most impressive mosques in Istanbul. The Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, historic Turkish Baths and several museums are within walking distance of the hotel.

Guest Rooms - Being a special category hotel, built from an old Ottoman house, it has only 18 rooms and three family rooms. All are of a normal size and in very good condition. All rooms are equipped with en suite bathrooms, with shower and hairdryer. Bathrooms are small but again in good condition. All rooms have air conditioning and central heating system and also benefit from wireless internet, safety deposit boxes, cable television and minibar. The hotel also has non-smoking rooms.
